errors.pageNotFoundDescription: The page you are looking for might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.
errors.serverErrorDescription: We're experiencing some technical difficulties. Please try again later.
errors.unauthorizedDescription: You don't have permission to access this page. Please log in or contact support.
errors.businessNotFoundDescription: The business you are looking for doesn't exist or has been removed.
errors.connectionError: Connection error. Please check your internet connection.
errors.timeoutError: Request timed out. Please try again.
errors.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
